articles.author: Jacob Lev, Kevin Dotson, Issy Ronald, Jamie Barton, Kyle Feldscher
articles.title: The Oklahoma City Thunder win the NBA championship after defeating Indiana Pacers in winner-take-all Game 7 - CNN
articles.description: The Oklahoma City Thunder won the 2024-25 NBA title with a Game 7 victory over the Indiana Pacers on Sunday.
articles.content:
The Oklahoma City Thunder Sunday night finished what they started back in late October, and put the rest of the NBA on notice that theres a new sheriff in town.
